## Wrangling and processing the data

Need to transform hourly data into daily data with aggregate and pipes.

```{r, Wrangle & Process Data}
#Import data
df <- read_xlsx("./Competition/Data/load.xlsx")

#Wrangle and process the data from hourly to daily
df_daily <- df %>%
  mutate( Date = ymd(date)) %>%
  rowwise(date) %>%
  summarise(daily_data = mean(c_across(h1:h24)))

```
